modName: Immersive Immersive Armors - Chainmail Jerkin and Helm Retex
summary: Retextures the light viking chainmail and helmet from hothtrooper's great Immersive Armors to give it a more fitting, serious and neutral look. IMMUHRSION!
descriptionHtml:
[b]REQUIRES IMMERSIVE ARMORS. GET IT [/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/19733/?]HERE[/url]

[b]THIS ALSO WORKS WITH [u]UMSO[/u]! NORMAL INSTALLATION. GET THE OVERHAUL [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50995/?]HERE[/url]
[/b]
[b]Description:[/b]

Retextures the [b]light [/b]viking chainmail from hothtrooper's great Immersive Armors to give it a more fitting, serious and neutral look.

Changes: darker tones, dark blue desaturated kilt, back fur mantle darkened and recolored to fit a normal bear's hide, removed weird "pendant" that was present under the frontal fur mantle, darkened and added nordic design to the front of the clansman's helmet.

[b]Installation 

[/b]Drag and drop to your Data folder/use NMM/MO. Overwrite if needed.

[b]Recommended to go with this retexture:[/b]

Overall recommended to go with [b]Unofficial Morrowloot-Skyrim Overhaul (UMSO)[/b]. Has permissions from several authors and includes this pieces of armor. Get it: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50995/?]UMSO[/url]


[b]ALL credits and thanks to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3656551/?tb=mods&pUp=1]hothtrooper44[/url].
To Archiphres,[/b] for UMSO.
author: hothtrooper and villacardo retexture
